In Iraq, at a ceremony in Baghdad, US Defense Secretary Leon Panetta...
...marks the end of the US military mission in Iraq.
In Russia, Prime Minister Putin dismisses allegations of fraud in recent elections.
In India, at least 126 people are dead after drinking homemade alcohol that contained methanol.
In the Gaza Strip, Hamas commemorates the 24th anniversary of its founding...
In Romania, former Prime Minister Nastase is found not guilty of corruption charges.
In Lebanon, teachers take to the streets in Beirut, calling for better pay.
